SELECT b.id as systemId, b.systemCode as systemCode, b.systemName as systemName, b.systemUrl as systemUrl, b.systemLogo as systemLogo, b.description as description FROM k12system_k12system_post a LEFT JOIN k12system_k12system b ON a.systemCode = b.systemCode WHERE a.`status`=0 and b.`status`=0
and a.postCode=#{postCode}
